doc.title: Jong-ee bee-haeng-gi
doc.plot: A pilot is operating a small airplane in the clear and beautiful sky. On his way, he hides in the mid of dark cloud to escape a hawk. Then he happens to meet a bird, talks to him, but the bird flies away to the sky. The dark cloud is changed into a storm, the pilot struggles to survive. The plane is almost broken, but there's no one who can rescue him. After the darkness, Sun rises, the airplane keeps going. A kid feels happy to see the paper airplane fly. The former airplane is what the kid let it fly after separating its wheel.
